scripts.cdk:deploy:dev: DEVELOPMENT=true DEV_USER=$USER yarn run cdk deploy --all -O outputs.dev.json && ./format-dev-outputs.sh
scripts.cdk:deploy:prod:all: DATADOG_API_KEY=$(aws secretsmanager get-secret-value --secret-id lunatrace-DatadogAPIKey | jq -r .SecretString) yarn run cdk deploy -f --all --require-approval never
scripts.cdk:deploy:prod:run: echo 'deploying...' && yarn run cdk:deploy:prod:cleanup && ./build-containers.sh && yarn run cdk:deploy:prod:all
